short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight code snippets using the keyboard ('Ctrl-]' and 'Ctrl-[')

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A very basic extension that lets you cycle through code snippets on a webpage - selecting them so you can hit 'Ctrl/Cmd C' to copy without taking your hands off the keyboard. 

Feel free to fork at https://github.com/henkin/codebindle

I don't have too much time to work on this, so pull requests are encouraged.
